roleset.name: appear suddenly, become
roleset.note: BURST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'burst' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 48.1.1 and 45.4. (from burst.01-v predicate notes)
BURST-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from burst.01-n)

example.name: good enough example
example.text: She bursts into tears and walks away.

roleset.name: minor explosion
roleset.note: BURST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'burst' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 48.1.1 and 45.4. (from burst.02-v predicate notes)
BURST-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from burst.02-n)

example.name: agentive
example.text: If [Washington's elites]*-2 ever succeed in [*-2]bursting the tax dam, Americans will be engulfed in a red sea of new spending programs, such as federalized child care.

example.name: ergative/inchoative
example.text: The primitive operations also burst out the back door into a small courtyard, where an ancient press squeezes rubber solution into a flat strip and newly made tires are cooled in a bathtub filled with water.
example.arg: into a small courtyard, where an ancient press squeezes rubber solution into a flat strip and newly made tires are cooled in a bathtub filled with water

roleset.name: rapid movement,
roleset.note: BURST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'burst' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 48.1.1 and 45.4. (from burst.03-v predicate notes)
BURST-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from burst.03-n)

example.name: burst-v: stupid stock reports
example.text: But then it suddenly burst upward 7.5 as Goldman, Sachs& Co. stepped in and bought almost every share offer, traders said.
example.arg: as Goldman, Sachs& Co. stepped in and bought almost every share offer

example.name: burst-n
example.text: There were two primary factors that led to the burst of the Internet bubble:

roleset.name: blurt out
roleset.note: BURST_OUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Brown corpus. Comparison to 'blurt'. No Vncls. (from burst.04-v)

example.name: Little Women
example.text: "I do think that families are the most beautiful things in all the world " , burst out Jo some five hundred pages later in that popular story of the March family.
example.arg: "I do think that families are the most beautiful things in all the world"
some five hundred pages later in that popular story of the March family
